it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std

Class InstantiationMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.InstantiationMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstantiationRule<Bigraph>

    public class InstantiationMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstantiationRule<Bigraph>
    Objects created from this class are instantiation rules for bigraphs which are maps from the reactum sites to the redex ones describing how parameters (for the fixed width) are instantiated.
    See Also:
    RewritingRule

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InstantiationMap(int codomain, int... map) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPlaceCodomain()
      Gets the codomain of the instantiation map which is the number of redex sites or equivalently the width of the parameter before it is instantiated.
      int getPlaceDomain()
      Gets the domain of the instantiation map which is the number of rectum sites or equivalently the width of the instantiated parameter.
      int getPlaceInstance(int arg)
      Gets, for every site in the reactum, its image under the instantiation map.
      java.lang.Iterable<Bigraph> instantiate(Bigraph parameters) 
      boolean isNeeded(int prm)
      Tells if a site is needed i.e. if it is the image of some site from the reactum w.r.t. the instantiation map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstantiationMap

        public InstantiationMap(int codomain,
                int... map)

    • Method Detail

      • getPlaceDomain

        public int getPlaceDomain()
        Gets the domain of the instantiation map which is the number of rectum sites or equivalently the width of the instantiated parameter.
        Returns:
        the number of sites in the reactum.

      • getPlaceCodomain

        public int getPlaceCodomain()
        Gets the codomain of the instantiation map which is the number of redex sites or equivalently the width of the parameter before it is instantiated.
        Returns:
        the number of sites in the reactum.

      • getPlaceInstance

        public int getPlaceInstance(int arg)
        Gets, for every site in the reactum, its image under the instantiation map.
        Parameters:
        arg - the position of the site in the reactum.
        Returns:
        the position of the site in the redex.

      • isNeeded

        public boolean isNeeded(int prm)
        Tells if a site is needed i.e. if it is the image of some site from the reactum w.r.t. the instantiation map.
        Parameters:
        prm - the redex site.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the given site is the image of something under the instantiation map.

      • instantiate

        public java.lang.Iterable<Bigraph> instantiate(Bigraph parameters)
        Specified by:
        instantiate in interface InstantiationRule<Bigraph>
